welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Beauchamp, a charming city known for its picturesque streets, delicious cuisine, and rich culture. We hope you enjoy exploring all that our city has to offer and have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving mainly international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly serving low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration and have time limits.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Orly Airport and serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used for low-cost airlines and serves mainly domestic flights within France.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This smaller terminal is used for charter flights and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
